# Project Documentation Notes

This is a GitHub template repository for generating project planning artifacts.
Documentation IS the primary deliverable â€” all output artifacts are markdown files.

## Key Document Categories

- **Root-level artifacts**: Generated planning documents (PROJECT-PLAN.md, GANTT-CHART.md, etc.)
- **Template source**: `.claude/templates/PROJECT-CONTEXT.md` is the template; the populated `PROJECT-CONTEXT.md` at the repository root is the input for artifact generation
- **Claude skills**: .claude/skills/*/SKILL.md define artifact generation procedures
- **Claude agents**: .claude/agents/*.md define orchestrating agents
- **Issue templates**: .github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/ for GitHub issue creation

## Quality Expectations

- All generated artifacts must cross-reference each other consistently
- Terminology must match the domain research dictionary
- Mermaid diagrams must render in GitHub markdown
- Internal links must resolve to actual files
- Skills must use correct frontmatter (allowed-tools, not tools)
- Agents must use correct frontmatter (tools, model, name, description)
